title: Beautiful (Goblin OST)
lyrics: It's a beautiful life Nan neoui gyeote isseulge It's a beautiful life Neoui dwie seo isseulge Beautiful love, aa haa haaa Haneulalae neowa issdamyeon Sumswineungeosma- neulodo joha It`s a beautiful life, beautiful day Neoui gieogeseo naega saltende Beautiful life, beautiful day Nae gyeoteseo meomulleoj- wo Beautiful my love, haaa Beautiful your heart, haaa It's a beautiful life, haaa haaa.. ha It's a beautiful life, haaa haaa. It's a beautiful life Eonjena neol jikyeojulge.. It's a beautiful life Naege gidaelsuga issge Beautiful love, aa haa haaa Neoui nunmul neoui misodo Gyeoteseo hamkke hal su issdo- log It`s a beautiful life, beautiful day Michidolog neol salanghaesseossdeon nal Beautiful life, beautiful day Neoleul ilhgo sipji an- ha Beautiful my love.. Beautiful your heart, haaa It`s a beautiful life Sesange neowa dalmeun chueo- gi Tto deonggeuleoni Naege namgyeojyeoisseo.. noo hooo Neowaui gieog.. neowaui chueog.. It`s a sorrowful life, sorrowful day Seulpeumeul igiji moshaneun naege Sorrowful life, sorrowful day Nae gyeoteseo tteonaji- ma Chueogsoge.. Naega salji.. Hoohoo, it's a beautiful life..
